articles.title: Quiet luxury for less than $15 â€” this Mulberry Silk Pillowcase is 21% off
articles.author: Holly J Coley
articles.summary: Lyshin has launched its Mulberry Silk Pillowcase Set, available on Amazon for under $15. The pillowcase, made with 100% mulberry silk, offers benefits such as preventing hair tangling and maintaining skin moisture, with available in multiple colors and sizes.

articles.title: Linux Package Managers on Windows: Why I Switched!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft is investing heavily in Winget, its official package manager, integrating it with the Windows Store and PowerShell. This will likely cause more software vendors to adopt Winget as their primary distribution channel, leading to a larger and comprehensive package repository. This will become the default method for many users.

articles.title: World first for South Aussie milk
articles.author: Hui Jin
articles.summary: Fleurieu Milk is introducing a new feature that allows customers to scan traceable QR codes on their milk containers using their phones.

articles.title: AKIJ Resource launches smart lifestyle brand â€˜Enovar'
articles.author: Anniversary Issue-I
articles.summary: AKIJ Resource has launched Enovar, a new brand featuring smart and modern lifestyle products, including electrical goods, home appliances, water pumps, and tools. The company aims to make daily life easier and more efficient with advanced technology, reflecting a move into the home appliance and consumer technology market.

articles.title: Transform Your Kitchen With These 42 DIY Products
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article highlights various new products designed to enhance kitchen functionality and aesthetics. These include items like a rolling kitchen island with storage, under-cabinet lights, and the SnapPower GuideLight, offering modern solutions and convenience. It introduces new products for home improvement of the kitchen.

articles.title: How to Get Your Products Recommended by AI Chatbots [Infographic]
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: SEMRush provides tools to monitor and optimize for AI search engines. These tools help businesses maximize engagement within the shift towards AI-driven product discovery. The insights are valuable for planning in 2026.

articles.title: These 36 TikTok-Famous Items Are Amazing At Their Jobs
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: SweatBlock launched antiperspirant wipes for hyperhidrosis, while Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream. Lottabody released a Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, and Dae launched a Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream. Several other companies like Anua, Catrice, Lumify, Sol de Janeiro, KISS, Kahi, e.l.f, Laneige, Death Wish Coffee, EOS, and Crest introduced variety of beauty, cosmetics, healthcare and food related products.

articles.title: Starbucks Strike Planned  $1 Fast Food Meals  : CA Business News
articles.author: Chris Lindahl
articles.summary: A new restaurant and wine bar are set to open in Rancho Cucamonga. Philz Coffee opened a new Pleasanton location, featuring its first drive-thru in Northern California. Einstein Bros. Bagels launched a new bakery in San Diego's South County. Bath & Body Works unveiled a store with a 'Scent Bar' and upgraded shopping space in the Inland Empire, and Osaka Marketplace is opening a Japanese Market and Restaurant Plaza in Pleasant Hill.

articles.title: Best Hair Dryers on Myntra: Powerful, Professional & Travel-Friendly Options
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra introduces new hair dryer models from various brands. VGR's V-469 features a 2400W motor, CK INDIA offers a dryer with a rolling comb, Ikonic presents the Blaze with an AC motor, and Winston provides a foldable ionic dryer. These models cater to diverse needs, promising efficient drying and styling.

articles.title: 30 Pairs Of Underwear From Amazon To Refresh Your Collection
articles.author: Kit Stone
articles.summary: The content introduces various new underwear products from multiple brands like Victoria's Secret, Hanes, Knix, Thinx, Bonds, Warner's, Calvin Klein and Vanity Fair. These include bikini panties, period underwear, briefs, thongs, and boyshorts, with features like breathability, moisture-wicking, seamless design, and special materials. The products are launched with customer reviews and price points.

articles.title: The Biz Beat: Los Gatos eatery blends authenticity with experimental
articles.author: Robert Eliason
articles.summary: Breaking Dawn Brunch in Los Gatos introduced the BurgerBot, a machine designed to automate burger preparation, including slicing vegetables and dispensing toppings. Owner Elizabeth Truong developed the BurgerBot to address labor challenges in the restaurant industry by automating monotonous prep work. The restaurant is also readying the BurgerBot for marketing to other restaurants.

articles.title: MSU men's basketball wins against Arkansas 69-66 at the Breslin Center Saturday night
articles.summary: StateNews.com launched a new version of its website, offering users a test drive of the updated platform.

articles.title: The Rise and Fall of the Amazon Fire Phone: What Went Wrong?
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Fire Phone in 2014, featuring a 3D display and other unique features, with the aim of facilitating shopping on Amazon. However, the phone failed to resonate with consumers and was quickly discounted due to low demand.

articles.title: New Xbox Magnus Console : 50M Sales Target With Windows, Steam & Game Pass Support
articles.summary: Xbox is planning to launch its next-generation console, the Xbox Magnus. Xbox has ordered 50 million AMD chips to power the new console.

articles.title: LivePerson Launches Conversation Simulator To Accelerate AI Adoption
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: LivePerson has launched Conversation Simulator, a new testing and analysis environment designed to help brands deploy generative AI more safely and effectively. The platform allows enterprises to test, train, and validate AI systems and human agents using synthetic customer personas before real customer interaction, aiming to address issues like accuracy, compliance, and operational risk.

articles.title: Not enough people are talking about this budget Lenovo laptop that overdelivers
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Lenovo's IdeaPad 5i presents a compelling value proposition at its price point. However, certain design elements may limit its appeal to some users, suggesting both strengths and weaknesses of the product upon its release.

articles.title: Amazon Unveils Bazaar App in Nigeria for Affordable Online Shopping
articles.author: Modupe Gbadeyanka
articles.summary: Amazon has launched its Bazaar App in Nigeria, providing affordable products across various categories with interactive shopping features. New customers receive 50% off their first order, and free delivery is available for orders above N30,000. The app is designed to reflect local cultures and affordability needs, ensuring product authenticity and secure transactions.

articles.title: A New Uncrustables Look-Alike Is on Shelvesâ€”and Dare We Say It's Better
articles.author: Mary-Linh Tran
articles.summary: Gold Medal Bakery launched Fave'Wich, a fresh, crustless sandwich featuring sunflower butter and grape jelly, which doesn't require freezing. The sandwiches are available in select stores and online, providing a convenient alternative to frozen options like Uncrustables.

articles.title: Morrisons reveals new Â£1 treat and shoppers say 'you can't beat'
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Morrisons has launched Chocolate & Orange Doughnuts as part of their bakery range. The new flavor appears to be a success with shoppers, with many expressing excitement to try them.

articles.title: Nintendo reveals which Splatoon and Zelda amiibo unlock Animal Crossing new villagers
articles.author: My Nintendo News
articles.summary: Nintendo is releasing a new software update for Animal Crossing: New Horizons in January that introduces four new villagers based on The Legend of Zelda and Splatoon. Players can unlock these special game-themed villagers using specific Splatoon and Zelda amiibo.

articles.title: 29 Home Products With Results Worthy Of A 'Whoa'
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article presents a curated list of newly introduced household products aimed at cleaning, organizing, and restoring various surfaces and items. These include a screen-cleaning brush, tile crack repair kit, wood polish, grout pen, and specialty cleaners for pet messes, appliances, and fabrics. Additionally, the selection encompasses organizational items, offering consumers solutions to household challenges.

articles.title: YellowInk Digital Launches LinkedIn Marketing Services to Help Founders and SMEs Build Influence and Drive Leads
articles.summary: YellowInk Digital has launched LinkedIn Marketing Services, designed to help businesses build their personal brand, grow their network, and generate leads. The service includes personal brand building, automated network growth, profile optimization, content strategy, and community management.

articles.title: Robotics Company Builds Straight-Up Terminator
articles.author: Joe Wilkins
articles.summary: XPeng, a Chinese automotive company, has introduced its next-generation humanoid robot called 'Iron.' The robot features dexterous hands, a human-like spine, gender options, a digital face, and the industry's first all-solid-state battery, which the CEO claims makes it the most human-like bot on the market.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 is launching on November 13, from specs and features to expected India price, everythingÂ toÂ know
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 in India on November 13, 2025, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a 1.5K OLED 165Hz display, and a 7,300mAh battery. The phone will include features like Touch Display Sync and a Glacier cooling system, with an expected price between Rs 65,000 and Rs 75,000.

articles.title: Magnus, here's what the next Xbox console could look like
articles.summary: Microsoft is planning to unveil a next-generation Xbox, a premium, hybrid console blurring PC and console gaming lines, with a launch window between late 2026 and early 2027. The new Xbox will have a new operating system, tentatively dubbed 'Xbox OS.'  Microsoft is collaborating with AMD on a custom APU, codenamed 'Magnus,' designed to deliver exceptional power.

articles.title: OPPO Unveils A6 Pro Lunar Titanium Edition with Premium Design, 7000mAh Battery
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: OPPO launched the Lunar Titanium Edition of its A6 Pro smartphone, featuring a metallic finish and enhanced durability. The A6 Pro includes a 7000mAh battery with 80W SUPERVOOC charging, a 120Hz AMOLED display, and an AI-powered camera system with features like AI Live Photo and AI Eraser 2.0. The phone has an IP69 rating for water and dust resistance and military-grade shock protection.

articles.title: The viral M&S pyjamas that are â€˜perfect' for a girls' night in or â€˜NYE in bed' & they're sure to be Kris Jenner approved
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new 'Dream Satin Cocktail Print Pyjama Set' priced at Â£32. The pyjamas feature a cocktail print design, Dream Satin technology for moisture-wicking, and are available in sizes 6 to 22. The product has garnered positive reviews online and is being promoted as suitable for girls' night in or NYE celebrations.

articles.title: The viral M&S pyjamas that are â€˜perfect' for a girls' night in or â€˜NYE in bed' & they're sure to be Kris Jenner approved
articles.summary: M&S has launched the Dream Satin Cocktail Print Pyjama Set, priced at Â£32 and available in sizes 6-22. The pyjamas feature Dream Satin technology for moisture-wicking and a stylish cocktail print. The product is already gaining popularity on social media.

articles.title: Nesto Group to Inaugurate New Sanad Branch today
articles.author: The Daily Tribune
articles.summary: Nesto Group is inaugurating its 143rd outlet, Nesto Market Sanad, in Sanad today. The inauguration ceremony is scheduled for 10:00 AM, with customer access beginning at 11:00 AM.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy Tab S11 in Nepal
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: Samsung Nepal has launched the Galaxy Tab S11, a premium tablet designed for productivity and creativity, priced at Rs. 129,999. The Tab S11 features Galaxy AI, One UI 8, an 11-inch Dynamic display, a 3 nm processor, and an improved S Pen, offering enhanced multitasking and creative tools.

articles.title: If Your Whole Bed Situation Could Use A Refresh, You'll Want To Check Out These 19 Target Products
articles.author: Samantha Rumore
articles.summary: Various new home products are introduced, each designed to enhance comfort and style.  Items range from bed frames and sheet sets to decorative pillows, lighting, and blankets, showcasing innovative features and materials like velvet, TENCELâ„¢ fabric, and memory foam. Prices vary across the product line, offering options for different budgets.

articles.title: 7 forgotten gadgets from the 60s, 70s, 80s and 90s that were once all the rage
articles.author: Property
articles.summary: The Kodak Instamatic revolutionized photography with its affordability and simplicity when launched in 1963. Speak & Spell, originally launched in 1978, was relaunched in 2019 due to its nostalgic appeal.

articles.title: GeForce NOW: 23 New Games Arrive This November!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: NVIDIA is expanding its GeForce NOW cloud gaming service with RTX 5080-class powered servers in Amsterdam, Montreal, and Phoenix. This upgrade unlocks features like ray tracing and DLSS 3.5, offering improved gaming experiences. November's lineup includes the launch of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and other titles, demonstrating the platform's growing appeal.

articles.title: ðŸŒ± Patch AM: A heartfelt farewell to a historic Youngstown church
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve their network and has been recognized as America's best mobile network in the US, according to Ookla Speedtest.

articles.title: Behind the speedy MyMzansi screens and the Presidency's race to build a digital government
articles.author: Kara le Roux
articles.summary: The South African Presidency's Digital Services Unit (DSU) has built MyMzansi, a new digital platform prototype designed to connect citizens to government services through a single digital entry point. MyMzansi features a functional digital ID, driver's license, a payments gateway, and a verifiable digital wallet, with a planned public rollout in the first half of 2026. The platform aims to digitize grant applications and payments, intending to cut fraud and save on administrative costs.

articles.title: Pre-orders have opened for the home robot that can perform daily tasks
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: 1X has initiated pre-orders for its humanoid robot, NEO. This robot is intended to function as a personal home assistant and carry out daily chores, with anticipated delivery to homes within the next year.

articles.title: 5 Phones To Buy Instead Of Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra In 2025
articles.author: TN Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S24 Ultra a couple of years ago. The Galaxy S24 Ultra still provides decent value within its segment. Alternatives exist that offer similar specifications for camera and battery, potentially at a lower cost.

articles.title: Salon chains feel the heat from home service platforms, dermatology clinics
articles.author: Vaeshnavi Kasthuril
articles.summary: Urban Company and Yes Madam are highlighted for their growth in the at-home beauty services market, driven by convenience and new service offerings. Yes Madam reported a significant increase in bookings, particularly for its Sokora Korean Glow Facial, demonstrating consumer adoption of specialized, accessible beauty services. Kaya Skin Clinic also offers new-age services like AI-powered anti-ageing and body contouring.

articles.title: China International Import Expo: L'OrÃ©al showcases China-driven innovation at CIIE, highlighting local research strength
articles.author: Transcript
articles.summary: L'OrÃ©al considers China an innovation hub and collaborates with Chinese biotech and startups. Otis Worldwide Corporation uses the CIIE platform to showcase innovations from its local R&D center, aligning with China's agenda of sustainability, smart cities, digitalization, and urban renewal.

articles.title: GALLERY: Durban North retailer hosts business market
articles.author: Candyce Krishna
articles.summary: Pick n Pay hosted its second annual Small Business Market Day, showcasing over 10 KwaZulu-Natal-based entrepreneurs. The event is part of Pick n Pay's initiative to promote small business growth by providing market access to emerging entrepreneurs, allowing them to present unique, high-quality products to customers.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra 5G vs Vivo X300 Pro 5G: Price in India, specs, and ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch its new generation S series smartphone, the Galaxy S26 Ultra 5G, in the first quarter of 2026. The flagship is anticipated to bring several camera and performance upgrades.

articles.title: Cannabis Club Systems Reaches 900-Club Milestone as AI Integration Drives Global Expansion
articles.author: Cannabis Club Systems
articles.summary: Cannabis Club Systems (CCS) released SmartBud AI, an AI-powered product recommendation module in September. CCS is also planning to release SmartCore, a data management layer, and rebranded its member application as PuffPal with integrated AI capabilities for personalized guidance. CCS is preparing to enter the Brazilian medical cannabis market with AI tools to assist doctors and patients.

articles.title: 29 Affordable TikTok Products That Won't Break The Bank
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: PanOxyl launched Acne Banishing Body Spray with a 360-degree nozzle. Nuts 'N More introduced Chocolate Maple Pretzel Peanut Butter Spread. E.l.f. released Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara. Stanley launched a 14-ounce Stanley Cup. Medicube launched Turmeric Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Mask and  "Zero Pore" Pads. EZ Bombs introduced two-pack of birria bombs. Essence launched "What the Fake!" Plumping Lip Filler and Lumify launched Lumify Eye Drops.

articles.title: I invested in a portable label printer, and it's already paying off for my office
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Nelko's label maker is a miniature device controlled by a smartphone or laptop app, providing labeling functionality.

articles.title: 27 Budget-Friendly Lovehoney Sex Toys To Gift Yourself
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Lovehoney is selling variety of sex toys. This includes a glass dildo set, a silicone finger vibrator, a rechargeable clitoral stimulator, and a powerful cordless magic wand. The products vary in features such as vibration settings, material, and purpose, catering to different preferences.

articles.title: DraftKings Promo Code: Claim $300 Bonus for LSU-Alabama, NBA, NFL Week 10
articles.author: Wtop
articles.summary: DraftKings is launching a promo code for new players. The promo code unlocks access to a 'bet $5, win' offer.

articles.title: You'll Tell Everyone You Know About These 42 Items
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream is being introduced, highlighted for its enchanting scent and skin-smoothing properties. SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes are a new solution to stop hyperhidrosis, nervous sweating, and hormonal sweating. Liquid I.V. Hydration packets serve to rehydrate fast and make hangovers a thing of the past.

articles.title: Alibaba's secondhand goods platform employs AI
articles.summary: Xianyu, Alibaba Group's online trading platform, is integrating AI technology to enhance transaction efficiency of secondhand goods. At the 2025 World Internet Conference Wuzhen Summit, Xianyu showcased AI-powered smart search, which uses interactive searches to match buyers with suitable items, and AI market insights, which provides price references and supply-demand trends. Currently Xianyu's AI applications are used by 45 million customers.

articles.title: Starbucks' $30 Bearista cup sends America into a frenzy
articles.author: Ynet
articles.summary: The coffee giant launched a new product: a glass bear-shaped mug called Bearista.
